name: nativescript-segment-view
description: Make same style of segmentbar in android and ios, and have more attributes

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-segment-view && cd ../src
scripts.debug.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.debug.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-segment-view && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-segment-view; tns plugin add ..
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run ios
